verses.verse: מַֽעֲנֶה־ <WH4617> answer רַּ֭ךְ <WH7390> A soft יָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> turneth חֵמָ֑ה <WH2534> away wrath וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> words עֶ֝֗צֶב <WH6089> but grievous יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> stir up אָֽף׃ <WH639> anger

לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> The tongue חֲ֭כָמִים <WH2450> of the wise תֵּיטִ֣יב <WH3190> aright דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> useth knowledge וּפִ֥י <WH6310> but the mouth כְ֝סִילִ֗ים <WH3684> of fools יַבִּ֥יעַ <WH5042> poureth out אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> foolishness

בְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> every מָ֭קוֹם <WH4725> [are] in every place עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> The eyes יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD צֹ֝פ֗וֹת <WH6822> beholding רָעִ֥ים <WH7451> the evil וטוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> and the good

מַרְפֵּ֣א <WH4832> A wholesome לָ֭שׁוֹן <WH3956> tongue עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> [is] a tree חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life וְסֶ֥לֶף <WH5558> but perverseness בָּ֝֗הּ שֶׁ֣בֶר <WH7667> therein [is] a breach בְּרֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> in the spirit

אֱוִ֗יל <WH191> A fool יִ֭נְאַץ <WH5006> despiseth מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> instruction אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father's וְשֹׁמֵ֖ר <WH8104> but he that regardeth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> reproof יַעְרִֽם׃ <WH6191> is prudent

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> In the house צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous חֹ֣סֶן <WH2633> treasure רָ֑ב <WH7227> [is] much וּבִתְבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> but in the revenues רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> of the wicked נֶעְכָּֽרֶת׃ <WH5916> is trouble

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> The lips חֲ֭כָמִים <WH2450> of the wise יְזָ֣רוּ <WH2219> disperse דָ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וְלֵ֖ב <WH3820> but the heart כְּסִילִ֣ים <WH3684> of the foolish לֹא־ <WH3808> are not כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> so

זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> The sacrifice רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> of the wicked תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD וּתְפִלַּ֖ת <WH8605> but the prayer יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the upright רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> [is] his delight

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked וּמְרַדֵּ֖ף <WH7291> him that followeth צְדָקָ֣ה <WH6666> after righteousness יֶאֱהָֽב׃ <WH157> but he loveth

מוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> Correction רָ֭ע <WH7451> [is] grievous לְעֹזֵ֣ב <WH5800> unto him that forsaketh אֹ֑רַח <WH734> the way שׂוֹנֵ֖א <WH8130> [and] he that hateth תוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> reproof יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> shall die

שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> Hell וַ֭אֲבַדּוֹן <WH11> and destruction נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God אַ֝֗ף <WH637> How כִּֽי־ <WH3588> then לִבּ֥וֹת <WH3826> how much more then the hearts בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> man

לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יֶאֱהַב־ <WH157> loveth לֵ֭ץ <WH3887> A scorner הוֹכֵ֣חַֽ <WH3198> not one that reproveth ל֑וֹ אֶל־ <WH413> to חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <WH2450> unto the wise לֹ֣א <WH3808> He will not יֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart שָׂ֭מֵחַ <WH8056> A merry יֵיטִ֣ב <WH3190> maketh a cheerful פָּנִ֑ים <WH6440> countenance וּבְעַצְּבַת־ <WH6094> but by sorrow לֵ֝ב <WH3820> of the heart ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit נְכֵאָֽה׃ <WH5218> is broken

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> The heart נָ֭בוֹן <WH995> of him that hath understanding יְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> seeketh דָּ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge [וּפְנֵי כ] (וּפִ֥י <WH6440> accept ק) כְ֝סִילִ֗ים <WH3684> of fools יִרְעֶ֥ה <WH7462> feedeth אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> on foolishness

כָּל־ <WH3605> All יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> All the days עָנִ֣י <WH6041> of the afflicted רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> [are] evil וְטֽוֹב־ <WH2896> but he that is of a merry לֵ֝֗ב <WH3820> heart מִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <WH4960> feast תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [hath] a continual

טוֹב־ <WH2896> Better מְ֭עַט <WH4592> [is] little בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> with the fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵאוֹצָ֥ר <WH214> treasure רָ֝֗ב <WH7227> than great וּמְה֥וּמָה <WH4103> and trouble בֽוֹ׃

ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Better אֲרֻחַ֣ת <WH737> [is] a dinner יָ֭רָק <WH3419> of herbs וְאַהֲבָה־ <WH160> where love שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> where מִשּׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> ox אָ֝ב֗וּס <WH75> is than a stalled וְשִׂנְאָה־ <WH8135> and hatred בֽוֹ׃

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חֵ֭מָה <WH2534> A wrathful יְגָרֶ֣ה <WH1624> stirreth up מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> strife וְאֶ֥רֶך <WH750> but [he that is] slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> to anger יַשְׁקִ֥יט <WH8252> appeaseth רִֽיב׃ <WH7379> strife

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way עָ֭צֵל <WH6102> of the slothful כִּמְשֻׂ֣כַת <WH4881> [man is] as an hedge חָ֑דֶק <WH2312> of thorns וְאֹ֖רַח <WH734> but the way יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> of the righteous סְלֻלָֽה׃ <WH5549> [is] made plain

בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son חָ֭כָם <WH2450> A wise יְשַׂמַּח־ <WH8055> maketh a glad אָ֑ב <WH1> father וּכְסִ֥יל <WH3684> but a foolish אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> man בּוֹזֶ֥ה <WH959> despiseth אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> his mother

אִ֭וֶּלֶת <WH200> Folly שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> [is] joy לַחֲסַר־ <WH2638> to [him that is] destitute לֵ֑ב <WH3820> of wisdom וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> but a man תְּ֝בוּנָ֗ה <WH8394> of understanding יְיַשֶּׁר־ <WH3474> uprightly לָֽכֶת׃ <WH1980> walks

הָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> are disappointed מַ֭חֲשָׁבוֹת <WH4284> purposes בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> Without ס֑וֹד <WH5475> Without counsel וּבְרֹ֖ב <WH7230> but in the multitude יוֹעֲצִ֣ים <WH3289> of counsellors תָּקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> they are established

שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> hath joy לָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> A man בְּמַעֲנֵה־ <WH4617> by the answer פִ֑יו <WH6310> of his mouth וְדָבָ֖ר <WH1697> and a word בְּעִתּ֣וֹ <WH6256> [spoken] in due season מַה־ <WH4100> and how טּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> how good

אֹ֣רַח <WH734> The way חַ֭יִּים <WH2416> of life לְמַ֣עְלָה <WH4605> [is] above לְמַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> to the wise לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because of ס֝֗וּר <WH5493> that he may depart מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> from hell מָֽטָּה׃ <WH4295> beneath

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house גֵּ֭אִים <WH1343> of the proud יִסַּ֥ח ׀ <WH5255> will destroy יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD וְ֝יַצֵּ֗ב <WH5324> but he will establish גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> the border אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <WH490> of the widow

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [are] an abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> to the LORD מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> The thoughts רָ֑ע <WH7451> of the wicked וּ֝טְהֹרִ֗ים <WH2889> but [the words] of the pure אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> words נֹֽעַם׃ <WH5278> [are] pleasant

עֹכֵ֣ר <WH5916> troubleth בֵּ֭יתוֹ <WH1004> his own house בּוֹצֵ֣עַ <WH1214> He that is greedy בָּ֑צַע <WH1215> of gain וְשׂוֹנֵ֖א <WH8130> but he that hateth מַתָּנֹ֣ת <WH4979> gifts יִחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> shall live

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> The heart צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> studieth לַעֲנ֑וֹת <WH6030> to answer וּפִ֥י <WH6310> but the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked יַבִּ֥יעַ <WH5042> poureth רָעֽוֹת׃ <WH7451> out evil things
רָח֣וֹק <WH7350> [is] far יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD מֵרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> from the wicked וּתְפִלַּ֖ת <WH8605> the prayer צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> but he heareth

מְֽאוֹר־ <WH3974> The light עֵ֭ינַיִם <WH5869> of the eyes יְשַׂמַּֽח־ <WH8055> rejoiceth לֵ֑ב <WH3820> the heart שְׁמוּעָ֥ה <WH8052> report ט֝וֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> [and] a good תְּדַשֶּׁן־ <WH1878> fat עָֽצֶם׃ <WH6106> the bones
אֹ֗זֶן <WH241> The ear שֹׁ֭מַעַת <WH8085> that heareth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> the reproof חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of life בְּקֶ֖רֶב <WH7130> among חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> the wise תָּלִֽין׃ <WH3885> abideth

פּוֹרֵ֣עַ <WH6544> He that refuseth מ֭וּסָר <WH4148> instruction מוֹאֵ֣ס <WH3988> despiseth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own soul וְשׁוֹמֵ֥עַ <WH8085> but he that heareth תּ֝וֹכַ֗חַת <WH8433> reproof ק֣וֹנֶה <WH7069> getteth לֵּֽב׃ <WH3820> understanding

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD מוּסַ֣ר <WH4148> [is] the instruction חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> of wisdom וְלִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> and before כָב֣וֹד <WH3519> honour עֲנָוָֽה׃ <WH6038> [is] humility
